rows.text: On the left, the soil is well covered by a vigorous crop.  This one will tend to have LOW EROSION and higher infiltration of water, which will store more rain in the soil.

On the right is a bare, eroded soil that has lost much of its organic matter and nutrients because of HIGH EROSION. Because it is bare and crusted soil, it will continue to lose more water and not store it in the soil.
